divs: sighting detailsi was outside, it was a very warm summer evening when an object that at first glance appeared to be a star or airplane, turned in a very unusal way and began heading north. the object was a solid and bright white light that turned slightly blue and began to hover for a few seconds until the light dimmed and i noticed a black outline of what could have been a craft (it was an egg\soft triangular shape as far as i tell). and before i could get my phone out and film it, it just vanished. it never made sound, in fact the area\neighbor was dead silent except for dogs barking in the distance. needless to say i was astonished and terrified.
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
Summary: Silent Bright White-Blue Object Turns, Hovers, Then Vanishes.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Poulsbo
There were no other sightings in Poulsbo on or around August 6th 2012
